original_title: Parado ou em movimento, vivo ou morto, ainda podemos senti-lo
overview: There is something we cannot see between a touch and its target.  Something we can feel beforehand, but with an unknown name.  In this film we reflect on what scientists call “tactile receivers” and how our memory deals with the somatosensory system.
title: Parado ou em movimento, vivo ou morto, ainda podemos senti-lo
